artist: Engraver: William Byrne; After Thomas Hearne; Draftsman: Francesco Bartolozzi; Printer: Samuel Middiman
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

In plate below image in black: [Drawn by T. Hearne  Figures by Bartolozzi Engraved by W. Byrne & S. Middleton/ LUNLEY CASTLE/ London Publish'd as y'e act directs Jan'y 1st 1779 by T. Hearne & W. Byrne]; in pencil below image: [1-202]
life_date: William Byrne, Engraver, British, 1743–1805; After Thomas Hearne, British, 1744–1817; Francesco Bartolozzi, Draftsman, Italian (Florence, active London), 1727–1815; Samuel Middiman, Printer, British, 1751–1831
portfolio: Illustration to "The Antiquities of Great Britain" 1786
title: Lumley Castle
